paracetamol.use: Fever and mild to moderate pain (headache, body pain).
paracetamol.dosage: Adults: 500mg–650mg every 4–6 hours if needed (max 3000mg/day unless doctor says).
warnings: Do not exceed maximum daily dose
People with liver disease should consult doctor

ibuprofen.use: Pain, inflammation, fever (body pain, swelling, toothache).
warnings: Avoid if you have ulcers or gastric bleeding
Avoid in kidney disease (doctor advice needed)
Consult doctor if pregnant or breastfeeding

omeprazole.dosage: Adults: 20mg once daily before food (as prescribed).
warnings: Do not use long-term without doctor
May reduce absorption of vitamins/minerals if overused
